name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 4, Huainan, Anhui. In Shunfa Zerunyuan Community, even though the owners have already replaced the new property management, the old property management still refuses to leave, continues to collect property fees, parking fees and other fees, and does not allow owners who do not pay to enter the community. The owner defended his rights at the community gate, and the security guard beat him. It is reported that Zhenhua Property’s boss Su Jinjun is a member of the CPPCC. The owner has called the local administrative and judicial departments to complain many times, but the other party did not deal with it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/qec5TuuLT7

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 4, Nanjing, Jiangsu. An old man woke up a girl on the subway and asked her to give up her seat. After the girl gave up her seat, the old man still refused to give in: "This seat must be given up. You went to school in vain without family education." Other passengers who spoke up for the girl were also threatened by the old man: Let the public security bureau investigate you. Do you know what I do? Tell you and scare you to death!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 4, Guangdong. The Golden Crown Hotel owed workers wages, and workers jumped off the building to demand their wages.
December 13, Weinan, Shaanxi. Huatong Road Bridge Company owed construction fees, and workers knelt down to the staff at the government service center.
December 1, Zhuzhou, Hunan. A village on Longquan Road was demolished, and the government’s compensation for demolition was too low, triggering protests from villagers.
December 4 (Released) In Huanggang, Hubei, migrant workers in Shangbahe Town demanded their wages at the gate of the town government.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 4, Jilin. Petitioners shouted for the Chief Prosecutor outside the procuratorate, hoping that the Chief Prosecutor would come out to redress the grievances of the people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up: On December 4, the entire wall was demolished.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the morning of December 4, Ryan Thompson, CEO of UnitedHealth Group, was assassinated in Manhattan.
In the video, a masked gunman fired several shots at Thompson at close range with a pistol equipped with a silencer.
It is reported that the gunman fled the scene on a shared electric bike afterwards.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Brian Thompson has served as CEO of UnitedHealthcare since 2021 and has been with the company for 20 years. He is known for his leadership in expanding Medicare Advantage plans.
The shooting occurred around 6:45 a.m. as Thompson, 50, was preparing to speak at a conference.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of December 5, Chuzhou, Anhui.
A man shouted from the window: "(unclear) Xi Jinping, overthrow the reactionary police, fight your way out! Fight your way out!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/RtBpd63wD1

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of December 5, a landslide occurred near Fuyuan Industrial City in Bao'an, Shenzhen, leaving 13 people missing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 4, Voice of America reported that the six major opposition parties in South Korea jointly submitted an impeachment case against President Yoon Seok-yeol. On December 5, Cailian News Agency reported that the ruling party in South Korea decided to oppose the impeachment case against President Yoon proposed by the opposition party, but would let Yoon Seok-yeol quit the party.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many media reported that a company uses thousands of tons of nickel slag to produce machine-made sand every day. Since Shandong does not allow the use of nickel sand, a large amount of nickel sand flows into the Lianyungang concrete market and is used to replace yellow sand as a building material. Experts say: Nickel sand used as a building material has problems such as radioactivity and heavy metal precipitation causing pollution, which may pose a threat to human health.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution On December 3, a domestic new energy electric vehicle had an accident in Jiangbei District, Ningbo City, Zhejiang Province. After the accident, the customer service staff rushed to the scene to cover the car logo, which was photographed by passers-by.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submission: CRRC Xi'an Rolling Stock Factory exploits employees and does not provide enough labor protection supplies, causing a large number of employees to be injured. At the same time, the working environment is poor and the production quality is also poor.
The workers who submitted the article reported:
Due to wearing inferior gloves for welding operations, workers were burned in large numbers and they all used welding wire to mend their gloves.
The workers were given inferior labor protection, only one pair of gloves and three disposable masks a month, and only one set of clothes a year. The clothes were all bought at high prices and of low quality. They could not be worn in a week and fell apart.
The labor protection warehouse staff also often complained that the factory leaders withheld workers' labor protection.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The workers who submitted the article also reported that the site was filled with smoke, but the air purification equipment was never turned on, and the dust removal equipment was only used to deal with inspections. The masks that the workers bought themselves were covered with dust after only three hours of wearing. The disposable masks issued by the factory could not provide protection in such an environment. In this month, only three disposable masks were issued.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The employee also said: As a state-owned enterprise, CRRC Xi'an Factory was unwilling to renew the contracts of formal workers and required all outsourcing. Later, the employees were asked to write a voluntary resignation letter and sign a blank contract. The company has a clear hierarchy system, divided into six levels of workers. Some workers do not receive overtime pay, and they will be deducted if they do not work overtime. During the Spring Festival, there were not enough employees, and employees were often required to work 22 hours in a row without rest, from 8 am to 6 am the next day.

Original text of the employee's self-statement:
We are an old central enterprise called CRRC Xi'an Vehicle Factory. The factory originally had a subordinate unit called Xi'an Vehicle Factory Industry and Trade General Company Rubber and Plastic Products Company. We entered Xi'an Vehicle Factory through this subordinate unit at the beginning. The first contract was two years, the second was five years, and the third was ten years. However, after the third ten-year contract was signed, in 2018, it was suddenly notified that all contracts would be taken back. We did not understand the law at the time, so we handed them all back in a confused manner.

Then the Industry and Trade General Company established a labor service company called...
fullContent:
员工还自述：中车西安工厂作为国企不愿给正式工人续签合同，要求全部外包。后又要求员工写自愿离职书，并签订空白合同。在公司内等级制度分明，分为六等工人，部分工人没有加班工资，并且不加班就扣钱。在春节员工不足，经常要求员工连续班22小时不休息，从早8上到第二天早6点多。

员工自述原文：
我们是老央企，叫中车西安车辆厂，厂里原来有个下属单位叫西安车辆厂工贸总公司橡塑制品公司，我们刚开始就是通过下属这个单位进的西安车辆厂，第一次合同两年，第二次五年，第三次十年，但是第三次十年合同签订后，到一八年忽然通知把合同全部收回，我们当时也不懂法，就稀里糊涂的全部交回去了。

然后工贸总公司又成立了一个劳务公司叫新运劳务公司，工贸总公司改制成信良劳务公司。

让我们跟新运签订新合同，也是第一次签订二年，第二次签订五年，本来第二次五年合同到明年也就是2025年9月30日到期，但是忽然今年（2024年）四月初，又通知我们写跟新运劳务的自愿离职书（没有任何赔偿，上一次也没有任何赔偿），然后跟信良签订空白合同。

我们小组正班长是正式工，小组内部有劳司职工，也就是原来橡塑公司的职工，还有我们这种技术操作工，也有临时工（临时工又分为劳司的临时工又五险没一金，外面劳务的临时工，没有五险一金）安排的活干完才能下班，没有具体时间加班从没有加班工资，而且不加班就扣款。

公司还将我们分别分为六等工人：
第一等公司正式职工；
第二等劳司员工；
第三等原公司背地里成立的劳务公司的派遣工（该员工自述为被划分的第三等员工）；
第四等 原公司背地里成立的劳务公司的临时工；
第五等外包队的劳务外包公；
第六等其他劳务公司的劳务派遣工。

根据员工自述，其中2022年1月因为疫情封控未上班，但是二月份发的工资把一月份封控时候发的基本工资扣除了。而且由于二月份上班23天，请假5天，在本人不知情的情况下扣除500，原因竟是因为没有加班。（但二月份是春节，实际法定上班天数是17天，所以在比法定实际天数还多一天的情况下还因为未全程加班扣500。当然即使加班也没有额外的加班工资。）

2022年4.28到账三月份的工资，其中无故扣款400元。

2022年6月到账五月份的工资，管理人员说我上了21天班，满勤是30天，请假9天，总共扣款1000元。
备注：基本每个月都会或多或少的扣钱，这里太多了就不细说了。

工厂随意克扣工人工资，强制加班，不免费加班就扣款，疫情期间不发基本工资。

However, People's Daily Online once published an article saying: "Revealing the crazy Bitcoin: 800 yuan each, a new Ponzi scheme?"
"Virtual currency is ultimately a pipe dream, a Ponzi scheme"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 4, Xinyang, Henan. A construction company in Zhongshan Ancient Town owed a woman a construction fee. The woman was forced to kneel down to the company boss to ask for the debt, but the boss looked disgusted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a Chinese student posted a post complaining that the United States uses the money students earn from studying abroad to benefit the disabled: equipping disabled people with buses, exempting disabled people from tuition fees, and providing them with caregivers and various facilities.
His personal homepage signature reads: See the world with an open mind.

name: 李老师不是你老师
李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a man who built a factory in Russia and invested in it posted a video advising everyone not to invest in Russia. To open a factory in Russia, the legal person must be a Russian, and all the equipment in the factory is under the name of a Russian. The Russian side doesn't care whether you make money or not, and all rent, taxes and other fees must be paid on time.
"For more than 20 years, no Chinese have made money here, only the Russians and the factory manager have made money"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, China has introduced new regulations for annual inspections of fuel vehicles. Fuel vehicles produced in July 2011 or later must undergo OBD system inspections, but many car owners say the inspections are too strict. As long as one abnormality is detected, the car will not pass the annual inspection and will need to be repaired at a designated auto repair station. If it fails three times, the vehicle will be scrapped.
This regulation has caused dissatisfaction among car owners. Some car owners have asked: Can OBD be used for food inspection?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 4, Chinese law professor Lao Dongyan wrote: In addition to facial recognition, excessive collection of personal information is also worthy of attention.
Some time ago, when I had my car serviced, the 4S shop employee asked me to provide my ID number, saying that it was required by the public security agency; I went to the hospital for laser surgery and the hospital asked me to take fingerprints. "I only remembered afterwards, why did the hospital collect my fingerprints?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 5, Chinese Defense Minister Dong Jun appeared in Shanghai to attend an interactive event, breaking the previous rumors that he was under investigation. This was his first public appearance after the media reported that Dong Jun was under investigation last week.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 5, Yiwu, Zhejiang. In a blind date group, a woman named Pan Ping met a man named Sun Ling (male) who claimed to be a "factory-level" department manager of a company under Shanghai Tobacco Company.
Sun Ling sent Pan Ping his work card to prove his identity. A few days later, Sun Ling asked Pan Ping if she wanted to work in the tobacco company, and said: Spouses within the system can work in the tobacco company, and the monthly salary is guaranteed to be over 10,000 yuan. She also asked that they could "sleep in each other's arms" when they first met.
The company involved: There is no such employee

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 4 (Released) Longnan, Gansu. Ms. Wang said that her daughter, who was in her third year of high school, was taken out for drinking by classmates and social people during evening self-study. After her daughter was drunk, she was raped to death by two men in their 20s.
Ms. Wang said that it has been nine months since the incident, why is it still being dragged on when there is solid evidence, and the video was blocked and restricted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"China's present situation has long been destined"
Xi Jinping: "If our party is weak, scattered, and collapsed, what is the meaning of other political achievements?" - People's Daily: Take strengthening party building as the greatest political achievement, 2016

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the "positive energy" blogger Lu Kewen complained about the high prices in France: a bottle of mineral water next to the train station costs 2.5 euros, equivalent to 19 yuan. Netizens questioned and debunked it. Netizens said that he specifically bought the most expensive ones, and there was free drinking water on the street. France's major disease medical insurance only requires a few dozen euros per month, and there are many benefits.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on December 5, Guangzhou issued new regulations, which will implement total quantity control on electric bicycles in due course.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 4 (Released) Zhejiang. A woman cried and said she regretted buying a house. She bought a house for more than 2 million yuan a few years ago, but just found out that no one wanted it even though it was sold for 1.3 million yuan in the same community. She also borrowed more than 1 million yuan to buy the house, and paid more than 5,000 yuan a month for 28 years.
If she sold the house, she could only sell it for more than 1 million yuan, which means more than 700,000 yuan evaporated in vain. "I just believed the nonsense of those experts."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Ma Ying-jeou Foundation invited a group of 40 Chinese teachers and students to visit Taiwan. The reporter asked Sun Yat-sen University student Cao Mingyu: Do you feel the atmosphere of democracy and freedom in Taiwan?
Cao Mingyu answered irrelevant questions and avoided the topic. Instead, he brought the topic to Sun Moon Lake. Then the reporter asked him about his opinion on the underground band "Fire Extinguisher", and he brought the topic to singer Zhang Yusheng.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 5, the Korea JoongAng Ilbo reported that Kim Min-seok, the top member of the Democratic Party of Korea, told the media that he believed President Yoon Seok-yeol might declare "emergency martial law" again and that he was "100 percent sure" of it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 5 (Release), Yunnan. After three years of unsuccessful attempts to demand their wages, migrant workers were violently driven away by the staff of China Sixth Metallurgical Construction Group.
December 5, Lanzhou, Gansu. Migrant workers held up banners in front of the office building of China Railway 21st Bureau to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 3, a Chinese man named Su was arrested on suspicion of raping a college student in Thailand. The police found a video of the victim in his mobile phone, as well as a large number of secretly filmed underskirt clips. The police have transferred him to the court with solid evidence.
Previously, a freshman female student (18 years old) called the police and said that she was raped by Su and was filmed by him.
In order to catch Su, the Thai police staged a trick to lure Su out of his hole. They first used a beautiful girl to lure Su. Su said he wanted to find another person for "multi-person sex". So the police disguised themselves as a sadistic lecher and made an appointment with Su to meet at the hotel.
At 7:30 p.m., Su arrived at the hotel. The police pretended to open the door. After confirming his name, the police hiding in the closet and balcony of the room rushed over to control Su.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The decoration company announced its closure in the early morning, which aroused doubts from the owners. December 1, Xiamen, Fujian. Jiujie Decoration suddenly announced its closure in the early morning, and the owners questioned whether it had planned to "run away". The company may owe money to the owners, workers, and suppliers. There are more than 200 people in the rights protection group. Some netizens also said that the company currently has only 300,000 yuan left on its books.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 4, Guangxi. An auxiliary police officer posted a video saying: I will be assigned to support the demolition of illegal buildings tomorrow. After all, those are the houses that ordinary people have worked hard to build all their lives. I directly refused and said, "If you want to fire me, fire me."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of December 5, students at Seoul National University held a rally to demand Yoon Seok-yeol's resignation.
The students sang Girls' Generation's "Into the New World" in unison, which has become a rally song for student movements since 2016.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 3, Chinese economist Gao Shanwen said at the annual strategy meeting of SDIC Securities: In the past few years since the real estate bubble burst, China's economic growth rate has been overestimated by an average of 3 percentage points each year, and the cumulative overestimate in the past few years may be 10 percentage points. 
Currently, the video is being deleted by major platforms, and Gao Shanwen's other speeches at the meeting have not been spared.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 4, Qingdao, Shandong. Some netizens found that the owners of the Qingtie Yunshang Guanhai project in Shibei District hung banners on the windows, calling the houses in the project rotten. It is understood that the price of the property is between 4 million and 9 million, and it was delivered on September 30. There is still no gas and heating, the public facilities are moldy and cannot be used, and the garage is completely rough, with exposed cement and steel bars, and the entrance is very small, so it is impossible to pass by.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At this moment, students from Seoul National University began to march out of the campus

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens detailed the purpose of establishing Golden Phoenix and the specific laws that Air China violated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Reported on December 5, People's Daily published an article: What should be changed must be changed resolutely, and what should not be changed will not be changed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Reported on December 5, Ningbo, Zhejiang. A vendor in Ningbo was fined by the Urban Management Bureau, and the vendor said he had no money and wanted to borrow from someone.
Urban Management Bureau: If you can borrow 30 yuan, why can’t you borrow 50 yuan?
Mr. Zhou, an insider, said that the Urban Management Bureau wanted to fine 100 yuan, but the vendor only had 30 yuan, so the vendor borrowed money from him, and said that he had recently broken a bone, and his mobile phone only had 30 yuan, so he couldn’t afford to eat, so Mr. Zhou lent her 50 yuan to pay the fine.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 4 (Released), a poem written by a Sanhe master in the bridge tunnel.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 4, winter arrived and the temperature in Shanghai dropped to more than 10 degrees. A local park was full of "old men hanging on the wall" who couldn't find a job. Some of them didn't even have a blanket.
A "old man hanging on the wall" said that there was a daily pay job for express delivery sorting, but the salary was only 160 yuan, which he thought was too low. "As long as there is a steamed bun, I won't go."
The photographer said: Because people's livelihood issues have not been resolved, it is difficult to find a job, not because everyone is lazy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 2, Jiangsu. An old lady was looking through a trash can on the roadside. She said: My husband passed away, so I went out to pick up some trash to sell for some money to buy pancakes. A kind woman gave the old lady some money, and the old lady was moved to tears.
Netizens mocked: "The country will take action"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the Veterans Service Station in Haidian District, Beijing, held an event called "Veterans Always Follow the Party - Veterans' Propaganda".
One of the veterans, Li Tiezhong, has been commended six times and received a Capital Guard Medal.
The Capital Guard Medal is a commemorative medal awarded by the authorities to all officers and soldiers of the capital's martial law troops after the June 4 Incident in 1989.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 4, Beijing Guojin Gold Company was exposed for defaulting on advance payments and equity investment funds to employees, damaging the rights and interests of former employees. It is understood that there is a significant difference in the treatment of employees in service and former employees. For former employees, the company's treatment is very rough, "Yesterday it was Xiao Tiantian, today it is Mrs. Niu", points, reimbursements, and commissions are delayed as much as possible, and various reasons are used to pay less or not pay.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 4 (Release), Zhao Minghua, the head of the 12th community of Tangfang Village, Beizha Street, Zhaoyang District, Zhaotong City, occupied the villagers' land through false certificates and fraudulent contracts, and threatened the villagers in front of the public security, court and other departments. The director of the judicial office had a bad attitude towards petitioners, and leaders at all levels did nothing about it. The villagers reported it for many years to no avail.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, "Russian National Pavilions" have sprung up all over the country. The company behind a "Russian National Pavilion" in Chengdu is a Chinese company. Some bloggers have also discovered that the sausages and other foods sold in the store are actually from China.
The owner of a store selling Russian goods said that Russian goods are really popular this year! A supermarket of 100 square meters can have a turnover of 300,000 per month.
A foreign trade practitioner said: This is a new round of IQ tax harvesting.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, "Russian National Pavilions" have sprung up all over the country. The company behind a "Russian National Pavilion" in Chengdu is a Chinese company. Some bloggers have discovered that the sausages and other foods sold in the Russian Commodity Pavilion are actually from China. The owner of a Russian goods store said that Russian goods are really popular this year! A supermarket of 100 square meters can have a turnover of 300,000 per month. A foreign trade practitioner said: This is a new round of IQ tax harvesting.
